00023     template<class model_t>class matrix_element: public MC_generator<typename model_t::value_type>,
00024                                                  public ps_generator_viewer<model_t>
00025     {
00026         public:
00027 
00028             /* Type definitions: */
00029             
00030             typedef model_t model_type;
00031             typedef ps_generator_viewer<model_t> base_type;
00032             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00033             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00034             typedef std::complex<value_type> c_value_type;
00035             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00036             typedef typename base_type::spacetime_type spacetime_type;
00037 
00039 
00040             const bool helicity_summed;
00041 
00043 
00044             const bool colour_summed;
00045 
00047 
00048             matrix_element():helicity_summed(false),colour_summed(false){}
00049 
00052 
00053             matrix_element(bool q1,bool q2):helicity_summed(q1),colour_summed(q2){}
00054 
00057             
00058             virtual std::complex<value_type> evaluate()=0;
00059 
00062             
00063             bool generate()
00064             {
00065                 return true;
00066             }
00067 
00072 
00073             bool evaluate_weight()
00074             {
00075                 if(this->gen!=NULL)
00076                 {
00077                     this->weight()=this->gen->ps_weights(!helicity_summed,!colour_summed);
00078                     if(this->weight()>(value_type)0)
00079                     {
00080                         this->integrand()=this->gen->ps_factors(true,true)*std::norm(evaluate());
00081                     }
00082                     return true;
00083                 }
00084                 else
00085                 {
00086                     LOG(warning)<<"Phase space generator was not defined in matrix element class...setting the weight zero."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00087                     return false;
00088                 }
00089             }
00090 
00093 
00094             value_type ps_factors()
00095             {
00096                 if(this->gen==NULL)
00097                 {
00098                     return 0;
00099                 }
00100                 return this->gen->ps_factors(true,true);
00101             }
00102 
00104 
00105             value_type w() const
00106             {
00107                 return this->weight()*this->integrand();
00108             }
00109 
00110         private:
00111 
00112             bool auto_update;
00113     };

00117     template<class model_t>class unit_matrix_element: public matrix_element<model_t>
00118     {
00119         public:
00120 
00121             /* Type definitions: */
00122 
00123             typedef matrix_element<model_t> base_type;
00124             typedef typename model_t::value_type value_type;
00125             
00127 
00128             unit_matrix_element(){}
00129 
00131             
00132             virtual std::complex<value_type> evaluate()
00133             {
00134                 return std::complex<value_type>(1,0);
00135             }
00136     };
